entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text:
@WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump As was the case with #COVID19, #Trump was too late to act. He did not have the ability, brains, or heart, to do what was right when it mattered most. Now he has done the same with the protests. He used his power to antagonize & make it worse. He must be voted out!

#GoJoe
